content.body: Yoav Weiss nicolo-ribaudo generally with JS module imports the URL is an observable, right? It's a thing you de-duplicate with. That seems a bit annoying with the `data:` URL approach for CSS module scripts. Although maybe the de-duplication is not strictly observable? Hmm.
